job.title: ETL/BI Developer, Azure (Engineer III, Software)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: Do you want to make a meaningful difference in the quality of healthcare Omnicell is empowering health systems and pharmacies to radically transform the way they manage medications so they can achieve the vision of the Autonomous Pharmacy Thousands of hospitals pharmacies skilled nursing facilities and care homes trust Omnicell to provide continuous innovation They need us to deliver solutions to meet the everevolving challenges of the healthcare landscape We encourage creative problem solving and outsidethebox thinking that only a diverse wellrounded workforce can bringbrbrJoin us as we build on our powerful combination of advanced automation predictive intelligence and expert services to create a safer future for patientsone where medication errors are a thing of the past Youll be joining an organization whose culture encourages individual development rewards intellectual curiosity and embraces an inclusive environment Join our growing company and help shape the future at OmnicellbrbrstrongEngineer III SoftwarebrbrstrongThe Engineer III Software is an experienced professional who participates in creating and extending Omnicell products This person is a solid developer who can apply industry and corporate best practices to produce quality applications This person applies their practical and theoretical knowledge from Computer Science and previous experience in Healthcare or a related industry This person works as part of a team to design and develop new products as well as maintain Omnicells current portfoliobrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Work as part of a team to design develop test deploy maintain and improve software lili Lead discussions and estimations required for product release planning lili Collaborate with software quality engineers in all phases of testing lili Collaborate with crossfunctional team on documentation and training lili Conducts code reviews for fellow team members as required lili Create unit tests to help ensure code quality throughout the applications life cycle lili Understand how Omnicell solutions meet our customers needs and how our suite of products are used across the continuum of care brliulstronguRequired Knowledge And Skillsbrustrongulli Proficient in Azure data warehousing solutions lili Proficient in Design and build efficient and effective ETL processes and solutions lili Demonstrated analytical and problemsolving skills lili Good interpersonal communication skills lili Knowledgeable in AgileScrum software development lifecycle management lili Knowledge of distributed source code control like Git lili Proficient in performing data quality and data cleansing solutions lili Knowledge of dimensional data modeling degree in Data Analytics lili Knowledge of pharmacy prescription claims adjudication PBM or medical EDI data lili Strong knowledge of PowerBI internal architecture and licensing protocols lili
